channel.title: CVE Feed for Khronos Group -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Khronos Group -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4969|2024-01-16T17:01:29.598Z -- khronos%20group -- opencl
item.description: A GPU kernel can read sensitive data from another GPU kernel (even from another user or app) through an optimized GPU memory region called _local memory_ on various architectures.
